duties_responsibilities.duty: Accountable for the management of Project Turnover/Handover process and Wood Commissioning Services.
Interface with client, construction contractors, and operations personnel to facilitate system handovers and maintain the integrity of the Mechanical Completion process.
Manage CMS application, discipline check sheets, system dossiers, project punch lists, and project certification documents.
Coordinate with other departments, staff, and project focal points for certification issues.
Data entry of completion progress in CMS and maintain custody of signed check sheets and testing procedures.
Establish positive working relationships, communicate clearly, follow oral and written instructions, and execute Safety Policies throughout the project.
Other duties as assigned or requested.

education_certification.credential: Diploma level education or relevant experience in a similar position for the past 10 years. Minimum 5 years' experience in oil/gas/petrochemical field with familiarity of onshore and offshore handover/certification construction and commissioning industries.
